TopicTitle: Fall through world at top of mountains.

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win 10 | CPU: 3.59 i7 | GPU: 4gb | RAM: 32gb

 

On the planet Dres when I attempt to land a ship at the very top of a high mountain, my lander falls through the terrain. I even saved right before landing and exited the game and re-entered and loaded and still the same thing happened. I was able to land farther down the mountain a bit. But then some weird force kept pushing the lander farther down the mountain as well as my Kerbal.

Edited October 1, 2023 by Anth12
